overview: Tough insurance investigator Mahoney goes to LA to look into the murder of a fellow investigator. It's found that the murdered man knew three different women — all blondes — and with each he had had a love affair. What is their connection to the crime? And will Mahoney bed all of them as well?
tagline: Three Blondes In His Life...And Each Was Someone Else's Wife!
title: Three Blondes In His Life
